channel.title: Heaven-PKZ Hamachi server
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][size=24pt]Heaven-PKZ - Hamachi Server[/size][/B][/CENTER] Hey guys i have made "finaly" my server online after i asked in over 5 websites on how to make it online and ofcourse they all sayed portforwoding but it did not worked for me so i thought in onother way and that way is hamachi . well all you need is to download hamachi from here : http://hamachi.en.softonic.com/ and to join any of my networks ( untill now i have 6 networks ) and then you simply run the client . well my networks names are : Raed-Haddad Raed-Haddad1 Raed-Haddad2 Raed-Haddad3 Raed-Haddad4 Raed-Haddad5 they dont have any passwords . [CENTER][size=24pt]About the server[/size][/CENTER] the server is a 317 server it have all the skills ( 21 skill ) and till now it is easy to get maxed as there is still not a lot of players in the server. the server have over 6-8 minigames + a lot of monesters and npcs to fight and a lot of good drops. and it have untill now 2 risk fighting area and iam working on the therd. IDK what to say more as this is my first server i make it online . you will say that i look like a noob or something like that because i use hamachi but well i did not found anyone that can help me so i made it in kinda nooby way. i think trying out the server would be better than reading this shit because as i sayed its my first time on doing this. well here is some pictures :: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/24mxjl1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/334isqw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/zm0fn9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/b6omcm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/ipt650.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/69g9qa.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/30xhgz6.jpg[/img]
in the client file click on run to open the game here is download link : http://www.mediafire.com/?aqtpaxwxwzvnylb
well if any of you got any tips on making this better send me a message on my email : elias.football9@gmail.com ( if you gonna say portforwoding then dont tell me ) and i hope to see new players coming to my game .

item.title: Heaven-PKZ Hamachi server
item.dc:creator: @elias_haddad elias haddad
item.description:
@elias_haddad wrote:

[quote=“TinyScape, post:2, topic:520447”]I’m afraid you wont get far with an Hamachi server.

Try looking up some guides for opening your ports.

Good luck anyway :).[/quote]
yeh i know that.
its all because i have not found a better way so i used a nooby way

Read full topic

item.title: Heaven-PKZ Hamachi server
item.dc:creator: @elias_haddad elias haddad
item.description:
@elias_haddad wrote:

[CENTER][size=24pt]Heaven-PKZ - Hamachi Server[/size][/CENTER]
Hey guys i have made “finaly” my server online after i asked in over 5 websites on how to make it online and ofcourse they all sayed portforwoding but it did not worked for me so i thought in onother way and that way is hamachi .
well all you need is to download hamachi from here : http://hamachi.en.softonic.com/
and to join any of my networks ( untill now i have 6 networks ) and then you simply run the client .
well my networks names are :
Raed-Haddad
Raed-Haddad1
Raed-Haddad2
Raed-Haddad3
Raed-Haddad4
Raed-Haddad5
they dont have any passwords .
[CENTER][size=24pt]About the server[/size][/CENTER]
the server is a 317 server it have all the skills ( 21 skill ) and till now it is easy to get maxed as there is still not a lot of players in the server.
the server have over 6-8 minigames + a lot of monesters and npcs to fight and a lot of good drops.
and it have untill now 2 risk fighting area and iam working on the therd.
IDK what to say more as this is my first server i make it online .
you will say that i look like a noob or something like that because i use hamachi but well i did not found anyone that can help me so i made it in kinda nooby way.
i think trying out the server would be better than reading this shit because as i sayed its my first time on doing this.
well here is some pictures ::

in the client file click on run to open the game here is download link : http://www.mediafire.com/?aqtpaxwxwzvnylb

well if any of you got any tips on making this better send me a message on my email : elias.football9@gmail.com ( if you gonna say portforwoding then dont tell me )
and i hope to see new players coming to my game .
